name: macOS Switches
description: Toggle switches for macOS system states and configurations

commands.name: WiFi Toggle
commands.switch: networksetup -getairportpower en0 | grep -q "On" && echo "true" || echo "false"
commands.description: Toggles WiFi on and off using the networksetup command. This allows you to quickly enable or disable wireless networking on your Mac.

commands.name: Bluetooth Toggle
commands.switch: system_profiler SPBluetoothDataType | grep -q "State: On" && echo "true" || echo "false"
commands.description: Toggles Bluetooth on and off by restarting the Bluetooth daemon. This allows you to quickly enable or disable Bluetooth connectivity.

commands.name: Dark Mode Toggle
commands.command: osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to tell appearance preferences to set dark mode to true'
commands.switch: osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to tell appearance preferences to get dark mode' | grep -q "true" && echo "true" || echo "false"
commands.description: Toggles between light and dark mode appearance. This changes the system-wide appearance to either light or dark theme.

commands.name: Sound Toggle
commands.switch: osascript -e 'output muted of (get volume settings)' | grep -q "true" && echo "true" || echo "false"
commands.description: Toggles system audio mute on and off. This allows you to quickly mute or unmute all system sounds and audio output.

commands.name: Caps Lock Toggle
commands.command: osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to key code 57'
commands.switch: osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to tell (process 1 where it is frontmost) to get value of attribute "AXCapsLock"' | grep -q "true" && echo "true" || echo "false"
commands.description: Toggles Caps Lock on and off programmatically. This allows you to control the Caps Lock state through automation.

commands.name: Num Lock Toggle
commands.command: osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to key code 71'
commands.switch: osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to tell (process 1 where it is frontmost) to get value of attribute "AXNumLock"' | grep -q "true" && echo "true" || echo "false"
commands.description: Toggles Num Lock on and off programmatically. This allows you to control the Num Lock state through automation.

commands.name: Docker Toggle
commands.switch: pgrep -f Docker.app | grep -q . && echo "true" || echo "false"
commands.description: Toggles Docker Desktop on and off. This starts or stops the Docker application for container management.

commands.name: MySQL Toggle
commands.switch: brew services list | grep mysql | grep -q "started" && echo "true" || echo "false"
commands.description: Toggles MySQL database service on and off using Homebrew services. This starts or stops the MySQL server.

commands.name: PostgreSQL Toggle
commands.switch: brew services list | grep postgresql | grep -q "started" && echo "true" || echo "false"
commands.description: Toggles PostgreSQL database service on and off using Homebrew services. This starts or stops the PostgreSQL server.

commands.name: Redis Toggle
commands.switch: brew services list | grep redis | grep -q "started" && echo "true" || echo "false"
commands.description: Toggles Redis service on and off using Homebrew services. This starts or stops the Redis in-memory database.

commands.name: Nginx Toggle
commands.switch: brew services list | grep nginx | grep -q "started" && echo "true" || echo "false"
commands.description: Toggles Nginx web server on and off using Homebrew services. This starts or stops the Nginx web server.

commands.name: Apache Toggle
commands.switch: sudo apachectl status | grep -q "running" && echo "true" || echo "false"
commands.description: Toggles Apache web server on and off using the built-in apachectl command. This starts or stops the Apache web server.

commands.name: Firewall Toggle
commands.switch: sudo /usr/libexec/ApplicationFirewall/socketfilterfw --getglobalstate | grep -q "Firewall is enabled" && echo "true" || echo "false"
commands.description: Toggles macOS built-in firewall on and off. This enables or disables the application firewall for system security.

commands.name: VPN Toggle
commands.switch: scutil --nc status [vpn_name] | grep -q "Connected" && echo "true" || echo "false"
commands.description: Toggles VPN connection on and off using scutil command. This connects or disconnects from a configured VPN service.

commands.name: Hotspot Toggle
commands.command: sudo ifconfig en0 down && sudo ifconfig en0 up
commands.switch: ifconfig en0 | grep -q "UP" && echo "true" || echo "false"
commands.description: Toggles Personal Hotspot on and off by restarting the network interface. This enables or disables internet sharing.

commands.name: Dock Autohide Toggle
commands.switch: defaults read com.apple.dock autohide | grep -q "1" && echo "true" || echo "false"
commands.description: Toggles Dock autohide feature on and off. This makes the Dock automatically hide when not in use.

commands.name: Night Shift Toggle
commands.switch: defaults read com.apple.dock night-mode | grep -q "1" && echo "true" || echo "false"
commands.description: Toggles Night Shift feature on and off. This reduces blue light emission during evening hours.

commands.name: Screensaver Toggle
commands.switch: defaults read com.apple.screensaver idleTime | grep -q "0" && echo "true" || echo "false"
commands.description: Toggles screensaver on and off by setting idle time. This enables or disables the screensaver activation.

commands.name: Sleep Toggle
commands.switch: pmset -g | grep -q "sleep" && echo "true" || echo "false"
commands.description: Toggles system sleep mode. This puts the Mac into sleep mode or wakes it up from sleep.

commands.name: Hibernate Toggle
commands.switch: pmset -g | grep -q "hibernatemode 3" && echo "true" || echo "false"
commands.description: Toggles hibernate mode on and off. This enables or disables the system hibernation feature.

commands.name: Updates Toggle
commands.switch: sudo softwareupdate --schedule | grep -q "Automatic check is off" && echo "true" || echo "false"
commands.description: Toggles automatic software updates on and off. This enables or disables automatic system updates.

commands.name: FileVault Toggle
commands.switch: fdesetup status | grep -q "FileVault is On" && echo "true" || echo "false"
commands.description: Toggles FileVault disk encryption on and off. This enables or disables full disk encryption for security.

commands.name: Gatekeeper Toggle
commands.switch: spctl --status | grep -q "disabled" && echo "true" || echo "false"
commands.description: Toggles Gatekeeper security feature on and off. This enables or disables the application security system.

commands.name: SIP Toggle
commands.switch: csrutil status | grep -q "disabled" && echo "true" || echo "false"
commands.description: Toggles System Integrity Protection on and off. This enables or disables the system security feature.

commands.name: TRIM Toggle
commands.switch: system_profiler SPStorageDataType | grep -q "TRIM Support: Yes" && echo "true" || echo "false"
commands.description: Toggles TRIM support for SSDs on and off. This enables or disables TRIM for better SSD performance.

commands.name: Spotlight Toggle
commands.switch: mdutil -a -s | grep -q "Indexing enabled" && echo "true" || echo "false"
commands.description: Toggles Spotlight indexing on and off. This enables or disables the system search indexing feature.

commands.name: Time Machine Toggle
commands.switch: tmutil status | grep -q "Running = 0" && echo "true" || echo "false"
commands.description: Toggles Time Machine backup service on and off. This enables or disables automatic system backups.

commands.name: AirDrop Toggle
commands.switch: defaults read com.apple.NetworkBrowser BrowseAllInterfaces | grep -q "1" && echo "true" || echo "false"
commands.description: Toggles AirDrop functionality on and off. This enables or disables the file sharing feature between Apple devices.

commands.name: Handoff Toggle
commands.switch: defaults read com.apple.driver.AppleBluetoothMultitouch.trackpad Clicking | grep -q "1" && echo "true" || echo "false"
commands.description: Toggles Handoff feature on and off. This enables or disables continuity between Apple devices.

commands.name: Siri Toggle
commands.switch: defaults read com.apple.assistant.support "Assistant Enabled" | grep -q "1" && echo "true" || echo "false"
commands.description: Toggles Siri voice assistant on and off. This enables or disables the Siri feature on macOS.
